Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.event

Events and event listeners.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CheckProvider<M extends ModelData> Interface for objects that provide check state.
Listener<E extends BaseEvent> Interface for objects that are notified of GXT events.
Observable Abstract base class for objects that register listeners and fire events.
SelectionProvider<M extends ModelData> Interface for objects that provide a selection.
 

Class Summary

BaseObservable Default implementation of the Observable interface.
